figure.head: Figure 1:
figure.figDesc:
The ground-state energies E 0,l (B)'s for AlGaAs
as functions of the magnetic field for different orbital
states l = 0, 1, 2, 3, 4. Numerous crossing points,
where various orbital states cross, reveal at particular
values of the magnetic field. Locations of some crossing
points are shown by arrows.

figure.head: Figure 2:
figure.figDesc:
The optical intensity of the exciton as a function
of the magnetic field for the nanotube with ρ e = 636 Å
and ρ h = 600 Å
.
